item.description:
This is a music meetup to kick off the new year, jam, rehearse songs, and start recording. The present group goal is to:

1) Record a CD of originals & possibly covers.
2) As soon as we have enough material rehearsed, we will have a local show.
3) We will also be going to open Mikes in the meantime.

Meetup is Saturday Jan 16th, 2010.
Location is in East Cambridge and will be revealed to participants.

If there are lot of people, we will sequence the agenda based on interests, so please answer questions on your interests & goals.

If you have headphones for recording, bring them for recording, as I only have 4.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Jam/Reheasal/Recording Session #4
